fields.headline: Jobcast special: GCHQ
fields.bodyText: Then listen in on some vital careers information from GCHQ - on a strictly 'need to know basis'. That's to say, everything you need to know about the work, the training, the rewards and the working culture. And of course, how to get in. Listen now on your computer. Part 1 (15mins 28s) Part 2 (14mins 18s) The podcast RSS feed - subscribe to download future Guardian Recruitment Solutions series.
